meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Waymond Mitchell Zora Shinn Joshua Brakhage Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6529.

td.p: Waymond Mitchell, a quotation specialist from Houston, Texas
Zora Shinn, a retired attorney from Solvang, California
Joshua Brakhage, a TV news producer originally from South Coffeyville, Oklahoma (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,006)

tr.td: LET'S MAKE A QUILT
GEO-POLITICIANS
"L" CAN EAT
AUTHOR! AUTHOR!
EYE ON SPORTS
VOWELICIOUS
(Alex: Each correct response contains more vowels than consonants.)

Zora
')
